TopicTitle: NOT ABLE TO USE MANEUER NODES (KSP MODDED)

Articles.Content:
as you probably read in the title i can't put any kind of maneuer nodes in ksp career mode. it is strange because i'm able to do that only with career i started before modding it, with any new career nodes do not work!

i tried reinstalling all the mods i'm using, and even uninstalling them one by one to find the one which was not working, but nothing... the problem is still here. can you help me?

this is the list of the mods installed:

-ALCOR;

-ALCOR ADVANCED IVA; 

-COLONIST;

-CX AEROSPACE;

-EVE;

-FULL AUTO STRUT;

-KERBAL ALARM CLOCK;

-KERBAL CONSTRUCTION TIME;

-KERBAL ENGINEER REDUX;

-KERBAL HEALTH;

-KERBAL JOINT REINFORCEMENT;

-KERBAL INVENTORY SISTEM;

-KOPERNICUS;

-KW ROCKETRY;

-PLANETSHINE;

-SCANSAT;

-SIFIVE;

-SKY TONEMAPPER;

-TAC LIFE SUPPORT;

-TRANSFER WINDOW PLANNER;

-TWEAK SCALE;

p.s. SORRY FOR MY BROKEN ENGLISH AND SORRY BECAUSE OF MY HORRIBLE POST (IT'S MY FIRST BUT I REALLY NEED HELP)

TANK YOU ALL...
You can't use maneuver nodes in early career.  I believe they become available when you upgrade the tracking station.
I know... but the problem is that i can’t use nodes even upgrading the tracking station

7 minutes ago, elamiramir said:

I know... but the problem is that i can’t use nodes even upgrading the tracking station

Also Mission Control, yes? Maneuver nodes require that both the tracking station and Mossion Control be upgraded.

(If you update the tracking station but not Mission Control, you'll get patched conics but not maneuver nodes.)

On 10/12/2018 at 10:27 PM, elamiramir said:

I know... but the problem is that i can’t use nodes even upgrading the tracking station

Would you mind to start a new career save and max out all buildings with cheats?
